result.markdown:
---
title: "Aula10"
format: "html"
editor: "visual"
---


Correlação: associação entre duas variáveis 

Quanto maior a correlação menor o p-valor

## Correlação 


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(gsheet)
library(tidyverse)
imgss <- gsheet2tbl("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1bq2N19DcZdtax2fQW9OHSGMR0X2__Z9T/edit#gid=373270992")

imgss %>% 
  pivot_longer(3:5, names_to = "method",
               values_to="value") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(method, value))+
  geom_boxplot()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula10_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
imgss %>% 
  ggplot(aes(Assess, ImageJ))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth(method="lm")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula10_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-2.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
imgs2<- imgss %>% 
  select_at(3:5)
library(AgroR)
corgraph(imgs2)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
        Var1       Var2       cor            p
2 LeafDoctor     Assess 0.9666367 5.972544e-42
3     ImageJ     Assess 0.9776918 8.143613e-48
6     ImageJ LeafDoctor 0.9797478 3.144091e-49
```


:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula10_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-3.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
cor.test(imgs2$Assess, imgs2$LeafDoctor)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```

	Pearson's product-moment correlation

data:  imgs2$Assess and imgs2$LeafDoctor
t = 31.119, df = 68, p-value < 2.2e-16
alternative hypothesis: true correlation is not equal to 0
95 percent confidence interval:
 0.9466882 0.9792005
sample estimates:
      cor 
0.9666367 
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
cor(imgs2$Assess, imgs2$LeafDoctor)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 0.9666367
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
library(corrplot)

library(gsheet)
library(tidyverse)
library(AgroR)
library(corrplot)


imgss <- gsheet2tbl("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1bq2N19DcZdtax2fQW9OHSGMR0X2__Z9T/edit#gid=373270992")

imgss %>% 
  pivot_longer(cols = 3:5, names_to = "method", values_to = "value") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(method, value)) +
  geom_boxplot()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula10_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-4.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
imgss %>% 
  ggplot(aes(Assess, ImageJ)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula10_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-5.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
cor_test_result <- cor.test(imgs2$Assess, imgs2$LeafDoctor)
print(cor_test_result)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```

	Pearson's product-moment correlation

data:  imgs2$Assess and imgs2$LeafDoctor
t = 31.119, df = 68, p-value < 2.2e-16
alternative hypothesis: true correlation is not equal to 0
95 percent confidence interval:
 0.9466882 0.9792005
sample estimates:
      cor 
0.9666367 
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
cor_value <- cor(imgs2$Assess, imgs2$LeafDoctor)
print(cor_value)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 0.9666367
```


:::
:::
